## How to Choose the Best Bluetooth Speakers Under $50

This review will prove that there is no point in spending a ton of money to
get a top-notch Bluetooth speaker. You can enjoy a balanced sound for less
than $50 and that’s not a myth. All you need to know is what features to pay
attention to when choosing the best Bluetooth speakers under $50. Here are
some basic tips.

### Size & Weight

Bluetooth speakers can be of different sizes. But most of the customers expect
them to be portable as the main advantage of such wireless speakers is that
you can take them wherever you want. Obviously, they may be not as powerful as
[PC speakers](/best-computer-speakers/) or even [bookshelf speakers](/best-
bookshelf-speakers/) but the question of quality isn’t always number one
especially if you are planning a trip or a beach party.

Still, not all Bluetooth speakers are compact. Some of them are rather bulky
while others can boast of a pocket size. The same thing is with weight.
Though, small speakers are sometimes heavier than big models.

### Battery life

Always pay attention to the battery life of a speaker. It may vary from 5
hours to 24 hours of playtime. Note that the battery life mentioned in the
list of speaker’s characteristics often goes together with the percentage of
the volume used for performance. Just compare speakers with 8-hour battery
life at 50% and 75% volume.

Another thing to consider is the time of charging. It’s always better to have
a speaker with quick recharging.

### Sound quality

The sound quality of the speaker depends on the power of drivers it is
equipped with as well as radiators and processor. The higher quality they have
the better performance you will get. Remember that high-grade speakers don’t
have distortions at any volume and their sounding is well-balanced including
crisp highs and deep bass.

Seems impossible for Bluetooth speaker under $50? But there are models which
can impress you with their sounding. Sure, it may be not as good as expensive
speakers can offer but the quality of the audio is quite decent.

### Water resistance

It’s always great to have a water resistant, or preferably, waterproof
speaker. Still, not all models have this feature. Some of them have only
weather sealing while others include all types of protection. So, if you want
to throw a party by the pool, then it’s better to choose a waterproof model.

### Connectivity

Though the name of Bluetooth speakers presupposes only wireless connectivity
there are a lot of models which include 3.5 mm audio cable input as well. Such
an option is great in case you have to pair your speaker with a non-Bluetooth
device.

## 12 Best Bluetooth Speakers Under $50 to Buy in 2020

### JBL GO 2

#### The Best Mini Bluetooth Speaker Under $50

![jbl go 2](/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/jbl-go-2.png)  
This small box with a size of your palm will provide you with a high-quality
sound with decent bass. Though JBL GO 2 is a wireless model it has also got an
audio cable input. So, if Bluetooth isn’t available it won’t be a reason to
panic.

Another feature you will appreciate is its waterproof design. Having JBL GO 2
you can enjoy music resting by the pool or beach and stay calm when a splash
of water covers your Bluetooth speaker. It also comes with a rechargeable Li-
ion battery with 5 hours of playtime and a speakerphone. Easy paring is
guaranteed as well.

Pros:

  * great sound
  * compact size
  * audio cable input
  * waterproof
  * speakerphone
  * easy pairing

Cons:

  * can distort at high volumes
  * misses deep lows

### Anker Soundcore 2

#### Great Wireless Speaker Under $50

![anker soundcore 2](/wp-content/uploads/2017/05/anker-soundcore-2.png)  
Though Anker Soundcore 2 can’t boast of such pocket size as JBL GO 2 has, it
is a real monster among budget Bluetooth speakers. It is designed with dual
neodymium drivers and an advanced digital signal processor. So, you may forget
about sound distortions and enjoy music at any volume. In addition, Anker
Soundcore 2 is provided with bass up technology and a patented spiral bass
port for impressive bass.

This Bluetooth speaker also comes with weather sealing. It has ipx5-protection
safeguards against dust, snow, rain and even spills. Still not impressed? Then
what about its 5200mAh Li-ion battery that provides 24-hour playtime?

Pros:

  * excellent audio quality
  * powerful bass
  * 24-hour playtime
  * outdoor-proof

Cons:

  * not a lot of thumps
  * sounds a bit tinny at high volumes

### AOMAIS Sport II

#### The Best Waterproof Bluetooth Speaker Under $50

![aomais sport ii](/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/aomais-sport-ii.png)  
One more Bluetooth speaker worth your attention is AOMAIS Sport II. It has a
nice set of drivers that provide 20W full-bodied stereo sound. As well as
Anker Soundcore 2 this speaker has a powerful bass and shows no distortions.
Thus, you get enhanced but at the same time balanced sounding.

AOMAIS Sport II has a waterproof design with the highest protection level of
[IPX7](https://appleinsider.com/articles/15/03/09/apple-watchs-ipx7-water-
resistance-good-for-washing-hands-but-not-for-swimming). It means that this
speaker can stay underwater for about half an hour. Besides, it is dust proof,
shock proof, mud proof and includes weather sealing.

You will like its rugged design which prevents the speaker from scratches or
any other types of damages during your indoor as well as outdoor adventures.
AOMAIS Sport II also comes with 12 hours of playtime and inbuilt microphone
for hands-free calling.

Pros:

  * durable
  * 12-hour playtime
  * waterproof design
  * balanced sounding
  * hands-free calling

Cons:

  * a bit bulky
  * poor low-end response

![echo dot 3rd gen](/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/echo-dot-3rd-gen.png)

comes with Alexa. Just use your voice to learn about the latest news or to ask
for music. Need to call? Alexa will also do that as there is an option of
hands-free calling. Having such a speaker you can control all compatible smart
home devices too.

You can use Echo Dot to play your favorite tunes from Spotify, Pandora, Amazon
Music or any other sound platform. Note that except for Bluetooth connection
there is also a 3.5 mm audio cable.

Pros:

  * improved sound
  * hands-free calling
  * Alexa
  * audio cable input

Cons:

![jbl clip 2](/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/jbl-clip-2.png)

one due to its handle using which you can clip it to your belt without even
noticing it as this speaker is quite small and light.

JBL Clip 2 is IPX7 waterproof. As well as some pre-cited models this speaker
isn’t only wireless but also wired as it comes with an integrated 2.5 mm audio
cable. There is also a microphone for speakerphone calls. Thanks to its rugged
design it is quite resistant to different types of damages.

Pros:

  * audio cable input

![aukey bluetooth stereo speaker](/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/aukey-bluetooth-

provide you with great sound is AUKEY Bluetooth Stereo Speaker. It is designed
with enhanced dual 8W drivers and dual passive radiators. Thanks to DSP

with great bass.

There are two types of connectivity available: wireless and wired, so you may
choose any one which you like. Its battery life isn’t the most powerful you
have ever met but we believe 10 hours of playtime is quite enough especially
if audio cable is also included.

### Anker Soundcore Icon Mini

#### Take Your Music Everywhere

![anker soundcore icon mini](/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/anker-soundcore-icon-
mini.png)  
Have you ever wanted to start an impromptu pool party but didn’t have the
right audio equipment? Or maybe you’re looking for a speaker that can be
carried up a mountain for an end-of-hike celebration.

Regardless, the Anker Soundcore Icon Mini is the ideal product! It is compact,
lightweight, it is water and dust resistant (IP67), and delivers 8 hours of
playtime. It’s also easy to clip it on the backpack, bike, hang in a tent, or
simply carry in in your pocket.

Now, the sound is truly big for such a small device. Furthermore, you can go
stereo by pairing two devices to play simultaneously.

This tiny device supports Bluetooth connectivity, but it also comes with an
AUX input, in case wireless connectivity doesn’t work. Furthermore, it has a
built-in mic that lets you make hands-free calls.

Pros:

  * Compact & lightweight design
  * Fits in your pocket
  * Water and dust resistant
  * Powerful sound
  * Good battery life
  * Great value for the price

Cons:

  * It slides easily from smooth surfaces
  * Sound loses some quality at very loud volumes

### OontZ Angle 3 Ultra

#### Long Lasting Bluetooth Speakers

![oontz angle 3 ultra](/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/oontz-angle-3-ultra.png)  
One of budget Bluetooth speakers with the best Bluetooth connectivity is OontZ
Angle 3 Ultra. It provides fast Bluetooth connectivity at up to 100 ft range.
Pairing is easy as well. You can also connect two OontZ Angle 3 ULTRA speakers
together and get a great audio system with one speaker responsible for the
left channel and the other one for the right. Such a combination will create
excellent stereo separation.

OontZ Angle 3 Ultra has a powerful battery that allows it to play up to 20
hours. What is more, it can boast of a robust body that comes with a
weatherproof, splashproof and rainproof design. However, keep in mind that
this model can’t work underwater even if submerged partially.

There is also a 3.5mm audio cable for wired connection. This Bluetooth speaker
supports Siri when connected to your iPad or iPhone as well.

Pros:

  * clear sound
  * 20 hours of playtime
  * robust build
  * up to 100ft Bluetooth range
  * audio cable input

Cons:

  * not waterproof
  * a bit bulky

### DOSS SoundBox Plus

#### The Ideal Speaker for Your Party

![doss soundbox plus](/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/doss-soundbox-plus.png)  
The SoundBox Plus delivers a fabulous audio experience to anyone, anywhere! It
features a compact design with dual full-range drivers with a passive radiator
that manage to create 16W stereo sound. But the sound is not just powerful;
the notes are rich with crisp highs, accurate mids, and low bass.

The design is also impressive! The speaker is equipped with lights that sync
to the rhythm and keep the party going all night long. There are five lighting
patterns that can be adjusted according to your mood.

If you want to use it for calls, there is a built-in mic that picks up your
voice, supporting a crystal-clear conversation. Also, you can use it to
communicate with your favorite voice assistant (Siri, Google Now, or Cortana).
Furthermore, the capacitive touch controls are easy to use as they only
require a simple touch.

Due to the built-in 3200mAh rechargeable battery, the party can truly last all
night, as you get up to 20 hours playtime at 50% volume.

Not to mention that you can get stereo sound by pairing two SoundBox devices
together!

Pros:

  * Compact and lightweight
  * Supports Bluetooth 4.2 connectivity
  * IPX4 rating for water resistance
  * Good battery life
  * Pulsating light show
  * Powerful and impressive sound
  * One 3.5mm AUX port
